amendment.description: Amendment requires the bill's feasibility study to include an assessment of the monument declaration's benefits, including jobs and tourism dollars associated with managing a monument in perpetuity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-385 to require the bill's feasibility study to include an assessment of the monument declaration's benefits, including jobs and tourism dollars associated with managing a monument in perpetuity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barber amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
